_header: Jesu after our baptism ever thou us keep
_description: A prayer on the Seven Sacraments — one stanza rhyme royal

Bod549.First Lines:
Ihesu aftur oure Baptym euer thow vs kepeTeche vs to fight by that
                    Confirmacoun…
Bod549.Last Lines:
…And to kepe oure Ordre euer vnder thyn hondWhether hyt be in
                    Chirche or Matrimony bond
Bod549.Attributed Title: The vii Sacramentys to the Sone (f. 78)
